title: VPN stuck on connecting
issue: I just updated my Mac to the latest version and now VPN won't connect. It just shows 'Connecting...' and spins forever. I've tried restarting my laptop and reinstalling GlobalProtect but nothing works. I need to access internal systems for a deadline today!
expected_root_cause: GlobalProtect IPv6 compatibility issue with macOS Sonoma
vanilla_likely_response: Generic troubleshooting: check credentials, reinstall VPN client, contact IT, check internet connection

title: Phone email stopped working
issue: My Outlook app on my iPhone stopped syncing this morning. I'm not getting any new emails on my phone but they show up fine on my laptop. I already tried force-closing the app and restarting my phone. What's going on?
vanilla_likely_response: Generic troubleshooting: check internet, reinstall Outlook, check account settings, contact Microsoft support

title: Database connection timeout
issue: I'm a new engineer and I can't connect to the staging database. I have the right credentials because I can see it in the admin panel, but when I try to connect from my terminal I get a connection timeout. I'm sitting in the office right now.
expected_root_cause: Connected to guest WiFi which can't reach internal resources
vanilla_likely_response: Generic troubleshooting: check if database is up, verify credentials, check firewall, contact DBA team

title: Git push permission denied
issue: I'm trying to push my code to GitHub but it keeps saying 'Authentication failed for https://github.com/acme/repo.git'. I'm 100% sure my password is correct because I just used it to log into github.com. This is really frustrating!
expected_root_cause: GitHub deprecated password authentication, need to use Personal Access Token
vanilla_likely_response: Generic troubleshooting: reset password, check SSH keys, verify remote URL, check repository permissions

title: Slack messages not appearing
issue: I keep missing important Slack messages. My teammates say they're messaging me but I don't see any notifications. I checked Slack settings and notifications are set to 'All new messages'. What else could it be?
expected_root_cause: macOS Focus Mode is blocking notifications
vanilla_likely_response: Generic troubleshooting: check Slack notification settings, reinstall Slack, check system notification settings

title: Screen share shows black
issue: When I try to share my screen in Zoom, everyone else just sees a black screen. I can see my screen fine on my end. This happens in every meeting and it's really embarrassing. I'm on a Mac.
expected_root_cause: Zoom doesn't have Screen Recording permission in macOS
vanilla_likely_response: Generic troubleshooting: update Zoom, restart computer, check Zoom settings, try a different browser

title: Can't open shared Drive folder
issue: My manager shared a Google Drive folder with me but when I click the link I get 'You need access - request access or switch accounts'. But she definitely shared it with the team. Other people can access it fine.
expected_root_cause: Browser is using personal Google account instead of work account
vanilla_likely_response: Generic troubleshooting: request access again, check sharing settings, contact the owner, try incognito mode

title: Docker can't pull images
issue: I'm trying to set up my development environment but Docker can't pull any images. I get timeout errors. My laptop can access the internet fine - I can browse websites and everything. Just Docker doesn't work.
expected_root_cause: Docker DNS configuration conflicts with corporate network
vanilla_likely_response: Generic troubleshooting: check Docker settings, restart Docker, check firewall, verify Docker Hub is up
